ClientHandler - Class in poli.persistenciadatostransaccionales.chatapplication.server

clientHandlers - Static variable in class poli.persistenciadatostransaccionales.chatapplication.server.ClientHandler
A thread-safe map of active client handlers, keyed by username.
clientSocket - Variable in class poli.persistenciadatostransaccionales.chatapplication.server.ClientHandler
Socket to manage the client's connection.
currentChatWithUser - Variable in class poli.persistenciadatostransaccionales.chatapplication.server.ClientHandler
The username of the other client with whom this client is currently chatting.
